4 #define REG_X_ACCEL_LSB 0x02
5 #define REG_Y_ACCEL_LSB 0x04

8 #define REG_G_SETTING 0x0F
9 #define VALUE_2G 0x03
10 #define VALUE_4G 0x05
11 #define VALUE_8G 0x08
12 #define VALUE_16G 0x0C
13 
14 // Normal mode: 0x00 (~140uA)
15 // Suspend mode: 0x80 (~0.5uA)
16 // Low Power 10ms: 0x54 (~16.4uA)
17 // Low Power 100ms: 0x5A (~2.3uA)
18 // Low Power 1s: 0x5E (~0.7uA)
19 #define REG_POWER_MODE_X11 0x11
20 #define VALUE_NORMAL_MODE 0x00
21 #define VALUE_SUSPEND_MODE 0x80
22 #define VALUE_LOW_POWER_10MS 0x54
23 #define VALUE_LOW_POWER_100MS 0x5A
24 #define VALUE_LOW_POWER_1S 0x5E
25 
26 #define REG_INT_STATUS_X09 0x09
27 #define CHECK_FLAT_INT 0x80
28 #define CHECK_ORIENT_INT 0x40
29 #define CHECK_SINGLE_TAP_INT 0x20
30 #define CHECK_DOUBLE_TAP_INT 0x10
31 #define CHECK_ANY_MOTION_INT 0x04
32 #define CHECK_HIGH_G_INT 0x02
33 #define CHECK_LOW_G_INT 0x01
34

36 #define ENABLE_FLAT_INT 0x8000
37 #define ENABLE_ORIENT_INT 0x4000

39 #define ENABLE_DOUBLE_TAP_INT 0x1000

41 #define ENABLE_SLOPE_Y_INT 0x0200

43 #define ENABLE_ANY_MOTION_INT 0x0700

46 #define ENABLE_NEW_DATA_INT 0x0010
47 #define ENABLE_LOW_G_INT 0x0008
48 #define ENABLE_HIGH_G_Z_INT 0x0004

50 #define ENABLE_HIGH_G_X_INT 0x0001
